listings.comment: Reza and his team have worked with me for quite some time and always helping me with my website after I mess things up. These guys are so good at figuring out what I’ve done wrong and are able to fix it. They have stayed true to their word of sticking by a client after completing the job.  Glad to be working with them.

Working with Shohanur was a very good experience! He is not only a highly skilled developer but also has a good eye for design and made proactive suggestions which improved the loom of the site.  He understood my requirements perfectly and delivered a great looking fully responsive website with perfect functionality. Despite the time zone difference, everything worked smoothly. We had a few zoom calls to clarify the brief and requirements, and was patient as my IT skills are basic.  He patiently took the time to explain everything in a handover call, making sure I can do basic updates myself in the dashboard. I have no hesitation in working with him again for future upgrades and changes. Highly recommended!

Shuvo was exceptionally patient working with me, as I know very little about IT. He created a clean modern website, at exceptional value. He responds extremely quickly to requests. I am very happy with my new website, and I look forward to working with Shuvo again. He gives excellent guidance and advice, and has good ideas for websites.

Working with Shohanur was a fantastic experience! He is highly skilled, responsive, and dedicated to delivering quality work. The website he created is visually appealing, fully responsive, and packed with the features I needed. His attention to detail and clear communication made everything smooth and easy. I’m extremely happy with the outcome and would definitely recommend him for any web development project. Looking forward to collaborating again!

I am pleased working with Shovu, He designed a professional website for my business consist of various features. He delivered it on time and was always available to address the comments as many time as required to my satisfaction. From the delivery, I can see he knows his work. I will work with him again and recommend for designing.
